channel.title: Emusion Coming Soon;
channel.description:
[img]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/6339/43660799.png[/img]
[size=18pt][u]Introduction[/u][/size] Emusion is soon to become a new RSPS, i have only just came up with the idea, and sooner to start hiring staff members, for the community. Emusion is based with a 508, with hope of all skills and all items. Emusion will take its time to evolved in a new active server as we are starting from scratch. As Emusion has only just started at this moment in time, this thread will not include, any images of the server. But be aware to check bare, in a couple of days for image/server updates. We do not have a release date for our upcoming server, as we have only just started. We are hoping for it to all develop into an active server within the space of a month.
[size=18pt][u]Information[/u][/size] Client Version: 508 Additional Contact Information: Emusion over the weeks will soon get there forum and up and running for contact reasons, and also to hopefuly make the server more active. We are soon hoping to launch a YOUTUBE channel for videos on the server for all you users to examine and see if you like the server. Also like i said please check back for more information on these features.
[u]Features[/u] All these features will be included in the server, All resource skils, All combat skills,
JAD God wars Corperal Beast PvN ( NPC Combat), PVP,
And More!
[u]Team[/u] In Emusion we are looking for dedicated staff who will alwaysbe raring to go, and raring to help the community. At the moment, we are desperate for coders. If you are a coder and you do need business please either post on here, or PM.
Thank You.
M A X E D

item.title: Emusion Coming Soon;
item.dc:creator: @M_A_X_E_D M A X E D
item.description:
@M_A_X_E_D wrote:

[size=18pt]Introduction[/size]
Emusion is soon to become a new RSPS, i have only just came up with the idea, and sooner to start hiring staff members, for the community. Emusion is based with a 508, with hope of all skills and all items. Emusion will take its time to evolved in a new active server as we are starting from scratch. As Emusion has only just started at this moment in time, this thread will not include, any images of the server. But be aware to check bare, in a couple of days for image/server updates. We do not have a release date for our upcoming server, as we have only just started. We are hoping for it to all develop into an active server within the space of a month.

[size=18pt]Information[/size]
Client Version: 508
Additional Contact Information: Emusion over the weeks will soon get there forum and up and running for contact reasons, and also to hopefuly make the server more active. We are soon hoping to launch a YOUTUBE channel for videos on the server for all you users to examine and see if you like the server. Also like i said please check back for more information on these features.

Features
All these features will be included in the server,
All resource skils,
All combat skills,

JAD
God wars
Corperal Beast
PvN ( NPC Combat),
PVP,

And More!

Team
In Emusion we are looking for dedicated staff who will alwaysbe raring to go, and raring to help the community.
At the moment, we are desperate for coders.
If you are a coder and you do need business please either post on here, or PM.

Thank You.

M A X E D
